channel.title: Optical Coherence Tomography on Jonathan Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Optical Coherence Tomography on Jonathan Huang

item.title: Prediction and Detection of Glaucomatous Visual Field Progression Using Deep Learning on Macular Optical Coherence Tomography
item.description: We investigate how unsupervised learning methods applied to macular optical coherence tomography may detect and predict glaucoma progression.
